ygData.subject: Re: Honeycombs
ygData.msgSnippet: There is supposed to be a quest in Halas with Dok in the cigar shop that rewards you with fac/exp 1p and an everburn candle for 6 honeycombs. The candle is +2
ygData.messageBody:
There is supposed to be a quest in Halas with Dok in the cigar shop that
rewards you with fac/exp 1p and an everburn candle for 6 honeycombs. The
candle is +2 vs poison and cold. But buying honeycombs for 1p each? shrug

Namash
----- Original Message -----
From: <Sean.Clark@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: August 18, 1999 10:33 AM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Honeycombs


> From: Sean.Clark@...
>
> Honeycombs are found off of Bixies and Bixie Drones. These little guys
are
> prolly like lvl 2 -4 ...certainly none that I can remember higher than
> 5....I was collecting them last week and selling them for one plat
> each...made a bundle of $$ that way (wee at least for a lvl 8 character :)
> they are used for making Honeyjum....and , I think for another quest...but
> after selling a bunch of the honeycomb I began wondering why it was so
> valuable...and I STILL don't understand why people are paying such an
> outrageous amount of $$ for it!!
> Anybody know the answer to this puzzle>>????
> Sean
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mr. Beano [mailto:mooglewarrior@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 11:20 AM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQCheats] Honeycombs
>
>
> From: "Mr. Beano" <mooglewarrior@...>
>
> I would like to know where and how to get honeycombs and off what
creatures.
>
> I hear a lot of people are paying 1-5pp for them because of a quest and
> that people at level 5 can get honeycombs. This would be great for making
> quick money.
>
